name: Pokémon Legs Version
description:
The much-anticipated follow up to Pokémon Dusk is finally here! Enjoy the latest Pokémon adventure and learn why critics say this latest entry has serious legs. Play time: about 5 minutes.

Created in a few hours somewhere between Hebron and Wellington at the annual Beets game jam with the theme of Pokémon.

(Searching for a Pokémon Arms ROM. Let us know if you know where to find it.)
